abilities.name: Masterful Tactician
abilities.rule: At the start of your Command phase, if this model is on the battlefield, you gain 1CP.

abilities.name: Supreme Grand Master
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[SUSTAINED HITS 1]** ability.

abilities.name: The Lion Helm
abilities.rule: Models in the bearer’s unit have a 4+ invulnerable save. In addition, once per battle, in any phase, the bearer can summon a Watcher in the Dark. When it does, until the end of the phase, models in the bearer’s unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

wargear_abilities.name: The Lion Helm
wargear_abilities.rule: Models in the bearer’s unit have a 4+ invulnerable save. In addition, once per battle, in any phase, the bearer can summon a Watcher in the Dark. When it does, until the end of the phase, models in the bearer’s unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.
